entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `Match.NextMatch` returns incorrect `Index` values for `Regex.Match(string, int, int)` #72704
  • Implement Thread Abort second pass redirection on Unix #72703
  • Composite R2R binaries do not have a copyright in the PE #72701
  • JsonStringEnumConverter does not properly serialize properties with default value (i.e. not set) #72699
  • [libraries-jitstressregs] Assertion failure !CREATE_CHECK_STRING(!"Detected use of a corrupted OBJECTREF. Possible GC hole.") #72697
    7.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Segmentation fault in stress tests #72696
  • ILDAsm and ILAsm don't handle the `no.` prefix #72695
    Future
  • Stepping into R2R ends up in SIGBUS #72692
  • Use custom GC PAL for all GC build flavors #72684
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json uses inconsistent polymorphism semantics with custom `object` converters #72681
    7.0.0
  • ViaHeaderValue throws on TryParse #72677
    7.0.0
  • Cannot serialize/deserialize entity with default value of nullable enum type #72674
  • Reg optional analysis in lowering is missing safety checks #72673
  • STJ source generator fails when two JsonSerializerContext derived types have same name in project #72671
  • [QUIC] Surface transport error code in QuicException #72666
    8.0.0
  • WebAssembly Blazor Breakpoint stopping after it is removed. #72663
    7.0.0
  • Track upstreaming llvm-libunwind patches #72655

Closed

  • m_UnresolvedClassLock is held in an unsafe way for Func Evals #60565
    7.0.0
  • X500DistinguishedName object with ForceUTF8Encoding flag produces different ASN.1 encoding on different platforms #72691
  • .NET 6 TimeZoneInfo.FindSystemTimeZoneById does not support IANA timezone ids on Windows Server 2016 & 2019 #62329
    7.0.0
  • X509AuthorityKeyIdentifierExtension should be public #24931
    7.0.0
  • NativeAOT: Failed to compile virtual statics with default implementation #70930
    7.0.0
  • Internal CLR error when editing code while debugging step by step. #72689
    8.0.0
  • System.Number.BigInteger.DivRem can output an incorrect remainder #72113
    7.0.0
  • PipeReaderStream.ReadInternal throws AggregateException unexpectedly #70206
    7.0.0
  • jit.1 work item failing on mono #67888
    7.0.0
  • Segmentation fault in ilc when building native code for System.Reflection.Tests (NativeAOT, ARM64, Ubuntu 18.04) #71270
    7.0.0
  • Fix incorrect assert for cgroup file system type #62960
    7.0.0
  • HTTP/3: Uninformative message when HTTP/3 connection fails #70949
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.UnscopedRefAttribute #72074
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.Tests.ConstructorTests_Default_String.MultipleThreadsLooping #71520
    7.0.0
  • [QUIC] Support for OpenSSL build of MsQuic on Windows #69978
    7.0.0
  • JsonTypeInfo generated using JsonSourceGenerationMode.Serialization throws NotSupportedException on configuration #72614
    7.0.0
  • Test failure: Loader\classloader\SequentialLayout\ManagedSequential\ManagedSequential\ManagedSequential.cmd #70295
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Methodical/explicit/coverage/expl_double_1_r/expl_double_1_r.dll #71917
    7.0.0
  • .NET 7 dotnet-trace output has `???` in stacks on Android #71640
    7.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] HttpConnectionPool may leak authorityExpireTimer / hit ObjectDisposedException #66782
    7.0.0
  • System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor.GetConverter have incorrect nullable annotation #69229
    7.0.0
  • The Enumerable.Chunk can leak memory (.NET 7) #72577
    7.0.0
  • Non-Seekable SubReadStream should not support the Length property. #63040
    7.0.0
  • Resolve inconsistency between \w and \b determination for what is a word character #62619
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Methodical/refany/virtcall_do/virtcall_do.cmd #71806
    7.0.0
  • NativeAOT compiler doesn't check for RequiresUnreferencedCode for methods accessed only through reflection #70698
    7.0.0
  • Warnings about Requires mismatch are not produced when DAM is used #70687
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Bail second pass redirection after catch in thread abort on Unix #72705
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Assertion prop #72700
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix ClonedServer_ActsAsOriginalServer test #72698
    area-System.IO
  • Fix x64 and x86 emulation on arm64 Windows #72693
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Re-enable the ability to use in-build signing #72690
  • Include libnethost.pdb in implementation packages #72688
    area-Setup
  • Refactor marshalling info parser to split overall logic from ordering #72687
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Ensure `GetCorElementType` returns underlying enum type on Mono runtime #72685
    community-contribution
  • Fix finding the Python location if the %TEMP% path contains a space #72683
    community-contribution
  • Fix ReflectionCachesUpdateHandler_CachesCleared test in aggressive trim mode #72682
    area-System.ComponentModel
  • Expands a list of always trimmed mobile+web CA with few recently added #72678
    area-CoreLib-mono, linkable-framework
  • Ldap search crashes on Linux when timeout specified #72676
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • [wasm] make debugger less noisy #72675
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Remove Http3RequestStream from _activeRequest when response is read/aborted. #72670
    area-System.Net.Http
  • HTTP/3 Made alt-used show only on alt-svc redirect #72669
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Enable IDE0060 (Remove unused parameter) analyzer #72667
    area-Meta
  • Update some more dependencies pulling in Newtonsoft.Json 9.0.1 #72662
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add markdown readme for Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyModel #72660
    area-DependencyModel, community-contribution
  • Avoid a couple theoretical reorderings in ManualResetValueTaskSourceCore #72657
    area-System.Threading
  • Introduce a default synchronization context for wasm #72652
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript

Merged

  • Fix debugger funceval deadlock #72179
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Respect ForceUTF8Encoding when encoding an X500DN #72694
    area-System.Security
  • Support ICU on Windows Server 2019 #72656
    area-System.Globalization, breaking-change, 7.0.0
  • Tighten nullable annotations on RegistryKey.GetValue #72679
    area-Microsoft.Win32
  • Add X509AuthorityKeyIdentifierExtension #72640
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, cryptographic-docs-impact, 7.0.0
  • Utilize new C# support for nameof in attributes in same signature #72686
    area-Meta, 7.0.0
  • Change PipeStream's sync I/O cancellation support to avoid blocking CancellationTokenSource.Cancel #72612
    area-System.IO
  • Add support for static default interface methods #72661
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Disable ThrowDuringProcessLog_ShutsDownGracefully test #72680
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • PipeReaderStream.ReadInternal throws AggregateException unexpectedly #70248
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution
  • Fix System.Number.BigInteger.DivRem outputting an incorrect remainder #72115
    area-System.Numerics
  • Add missing nullability annotation in CodeDom #72532
    area-System.CodeDom
  • Disable failing System.Text.Json tests on Android x86 and on Browser with threading enabled #72664
    arch-wasm, arch-x86, area-System.Text.Json, os-android
  • Bump Intellisense package version to Preview6 #72631
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Fix Globalization tests #72653
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove wrong cgroups assert #72372
    area-PAL-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • HTTP/3 Improved message for failing QUIC connection #72374
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Add `UnscopedRefAttribute` #72499
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Some cleanup of assembly helpers in hijack area. #72542
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete ConservativelyReportedRegion and CallingConventionConverterHelpers #72659
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update wasm related README #71951
    arch-wasm, area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Fix potential out-of-bounds array accesses in System.Data.Operators #72654
    area-System.Data
  • [QUIC] Support for OpenSSL build of MsQuic on Windows (Attempt 2) #72609
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Ensure JsonTypeInfo does not fail configuration for valid metadata originating from fast-path sourcegen #72630
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Additional tests for Generics in System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration #72449
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Simplify AppModel addToProject settings #72072
    area-Meta
  • Fixes overwrite of last captured managed stack frame address in EvenPipe stack trace. #72362
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, area-Tracing-mono
  • Fix HttpConnectionPool timers race on disposal #72615
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Add GCDescs in front of MethodTable to dumps #72658
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Correct nullable annotation on ICustomTypeDescriptor.GetConverter #72629
    area-System.ComponentModel
  • [wasm] Return int from console template #72623
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • Port the doc changes to source #72638
    area-System.ComponentModel
  • Clear list in Enumerable.Chunk prior to yielding #72637
    area-System.Linq
  • [LoongArch64] amend the LoongArch64's ABI for GCstress and NullableObject. #72573
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Disable NoStapledOcsp test on Debian 10 for now. #72634
    area-System.Net.Security

Updated

  • [IGNORE][wasm] Testing sharing wasm builds, for running tests #72347
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add analyzer support to validate the stateless marshaller shapes #72643
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • NativeAOT: Guarded devirtualization #64497
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • changing CPU from int to double #66743
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • [wasm] Move some defaults out of the templates #72626
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Use Roslyn support for RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan #70179
    NO-MERGE, area-Meta, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Make RateLimiterOptions follow Options pattern #72530
    area-System.Threading
  • Implement ControlledExecution API #71661
    area-VM-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Remove char[] allocations from RegistryKey #66918
    area-Microsoft.Win32, tenet-performance
  • Add RequiresAccessedThrough test to NativeAOT #72649
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • `LibraryImport` generator `AllowUnsafeBlocks` diagnostic #72650
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Add support for Requires in events #72651
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [iOS] Enable Diagnostics.Tracing tests #72545
  • Tear down pending HTTP connection when the originating request completes #71785
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • [WIP] Fixing the per object hard limit support for regions #72229
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #67198
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Make TypeBuilder.CreateType return non nullable #72180
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution
  • [Mono][Arm64] Instrinsify methods for Vector4 on Arm64 #72124
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Add support for specifying Kerberos package on Linux/macOS #72024
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • [wasm-ep] Implement DiagnosticServer and startup sessions for WebAssembly #72482
    arch-wasm, area-Tracing-mono
  • Fix overflow check for parsing format strings #72647
    area-System.Numerics
  • [iOS] Remove unnecessary newline from CI script #67861
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-tvos
  • [release/6.0] Work around for UriFormatException caused by \\?\ prefix in the path #71452
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Configuration, 6.0.x
  • Double the size of the previous segment #66930
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • X86 assert fix #72505
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Rename [RegexGenerator] to [GeneratedRegex] #72434
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add reference assembly for System.Private.CoreLib.dll #72143
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the wrong GCInfo when testing GCStress. #72572
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add support for the Aho-Corasick algorithm in regexes. #71588
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0][mono] add 400 band workloads #72379
  • Improve reliability of WarningsAsErrors replacement #72070
    area-Meta, 7.0.0
  • Use `GetTempPath2W` if available. #72452
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [iOS] Enable System.Data.Common tests #72554
  • [wasm][debugger] Debug on Node.js #68807
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] improve startup #72275
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Use locateFile to resolve path for assets outside of remoteSources #69441
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • [wasm] reduce legacy interop usage #72021
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [QUIC] Remove connection state from QuicStream #72599
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Add setter to TransactionManager.DefaultTimeout and MaxTimeout. #71703
    area-System.Transactions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Enable NI_Vector256_Create on AVX1 #72522
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enabling some tests back onto the Interpreted engine #72639
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
